apis_cloud: AWS (Amazon Web Services) for cloud hosting and data storage.
Google Cloud Platform (GCP) for data analysis and machine learning services.
health_tech: HL7 for healthcare data exchange standards.
X12 for EDI transactions in healthcare processes.
integration_patterns: RESTful APIs for integration with health information systems team and electronic health records (EHR).

evidence.claim: Vektor Medical utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
They employ FHIR standards for interoperability in their health technology solutions.
Integration patterns include RESTful APIs for EHR systems.
X12 transaction sets are mentioned in their interoperability specifications.

icp.icp_reason: Engages with X12 standards and focuses on healthcare data interoperability.
